title: Blizzard Boycott - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.09.19
description:
Get started today with the Hims complete hair kit for just $5 today by going to http://forhims.com/gamesdaily

Quip starts at just $25 and you’ll get your first refill FREE at http://getquip.com/games.

Gary Whitta and Greg talk about the continuted fallout from Blizzard's ban of Blitzchung.

Time Stamps - 
00:03:55 - Housekeeping
Kinda Funny’s coming to Toronto! 10/19+20!
Saturday 12:30pm - autograph session
Saturday 7:30pm - Smash Bros Royal Rumble (main stage)
Sunday 11am - The Kinda Funny Panel (main stage)
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:04:51 - Update on BlitzChung Situation
00:19:05 Best Friend Q. - After everything that has happened how does Blizzard bounce back? Can they bounce back? Or will this just be a thing we all forget on a month once blizcon begins? - Frankfurtter
00:28:05 Best Friend Q. - Should we be worried that games will change due to Chinese censorship or have faith that a majority of companies will hold onto principles instead of cashing in? - Jeff
00:41:10 - Massive Division 2 Update Next Week
00:43:35 - Man Steals from Valve, Reb @ GIB
00:44:34 - Apex Vaults are Open, Riley MacLeod
00:46:25 - Monster Hunter Updates, Heather @ Kotaku
00:47:55 - The Washington Post releases ‘Launcher,’
00:49:12 Best Friend Q. - Out today - The lawn-biologist
00:50:55 -  HIMS
00:52:08 -  QUIP
Reader mail   -
01:01:20 - Stadia will essentially predict what button you were going to press and press it for you on their end. What do you guys think of this?  - thevirtualboy
01:04:23 - Squad Up: Hyrum Reed (Xbox or PS4) - Strikeburst480
01:06:45 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Imran

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.
